mapper.select: SELECT a.* , MIN(im.item_image) AS item_image FROM (SELECT b.user_id, b.item_code, b.item_qty, i.item_name, i.sale_price, i.price, i.delivery_price FROM tb_basket b JOIN tb_item i ON i.item_code = b.item_code WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}) a JOIN tb_item_image im ON im.item_code = a.item_code GROUP BY a.user_id, a.item_code, a.item_qty, a.item_name, a.sale_price, a.price, a.delivery_price
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO tb_basket bas USING ( SELECT #{userId} user_id, #{itemCode} item_code, #{itemQty} item_qty FROM dual) new ON ( bas.item_code = new.item_code AND bas.user_id = new.user_id ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( user_id, item_code, item_qty ) VALUES ( new.user_id, new.item_code, new.item_qty ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET bas.item_qty = bas.item_qty + new.item_qty
